name: Sorry Computer
description:
Defend your computer from a virus that will completely block it! You will simulate a Windows 2000 computer.  The game is made for Alva Majo's GAMEJAM
For playing in Mac, execute chmod -R 755 Sorry\ Computer\ Mac.app in console as admin and after open with open Sorry\ Computer\ Mac.app
The portable version was going to be replaced to fix a bug, but the jam did not allow the version to be uploaded again. The installable is located in the download button, but if you want the portable you have it in the description with a link to mediafire.  Thanks <3.
https://www.mediafire.com/file/r5pjqdzitcmbjo7/SorryComputer_x86.zip/file
